name: furbish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make something, especially a room or building, look clean, new and in good condition: The homes are already furbished or in the process of being refurbished. We were given a tour of the newly furbished news room.
More examplesFewer examplesHe conducts his business from his newly furbished home.The offices are kept as empty shells until enough money is raised to furbish them. They built the hotel but did not furbish it.
